title: Dyed in the Wool Pink and Olive Splatter Fabric Is Coming to an End
content:
Polish bag makers Dyed In the Wool‘s limited edition olive and pink splatter fabric is coming to an end. The brand will stop making bags with this limited fabric, so if it’s something you saw and fancied, here’s a reminder that it’ll be gone forever very shortly. Dyed In the Wool can make any of its bags with this fabric so roll on over and check it out.

The post Dyed in the Wool Pink and Olive Splatter Fabric Is Coming to an End appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
